column5: Just had Dave make me some mounts for Lund Sporttrak for Salty rod holders. Great product beautiful workmanship machined from nice thick aluminum . These are solid as a rock really great design. Mount them anywhere along the track versatile no drilling very happy with them.
If it's anything like the burts it's amazing stuff
Its nothing like Burt's. Its custom. Designed, Built, and installed (likely in your driveway) by Dave Dutchak.
Dave is top notch. Had him make custom items for both my boats. If you have it, you know.
Cool that's pretty sweet ..I'll have to look into his product
Yeah my Lund has the thinner 45 degree Sporttrak so it was a new build for Dave. He came up with a great design and it is ideal. If I figure out how to post pics I will put them up.

Yeah my Lund has the thinner 45 degree Sporttrak so it was a new build for Dave. He came up with a great design and it is ideal. If I figure out how to post pics I will put them up.   Would like to see them. I have built some holders for a couple of guys with tracks.
Photos of Trojan Tackle rod holder mounts.
Wow !!! Looks good & strong for sure ... Some nice work and well thought out !!!  Great idea
he made downrigger mounts for me as well....absolultely amazing workmanship!
Very nice.. Looks equivalent to Cisco which is quite spendy due to the exchange rate.  Thank you, its good to know that we have someone in our back yard making this kind of stuff.
